comment: Feels Bad Man because from my tests of following randoms, I estimate that around % of all people on gab have banned me from following them. I get "forbidden" about in times when trying to follow someone. If I can't have anyone to interact with here then I might as well go back to Twitter or Facebook. Feeling very unwelcome on gab. Not a good first impression.
